---
name: Feature request
about: Propose an improvement to metrics, recommendations, templates, or UX
labels: enhancement
---

## Problem

What user problem are you trying to solve?

## Proposed change

Describe the change and where it should live (`scripts/`, `references/`, `SKILL.md`, etc.).

## Why this helps

Explain expected user value (cost saved, reliability, readability, install ease).

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] Clear expected behavior
- [ ] Testability (how we verify)
- [ ] Privacy impact evaluated

## Additional context

Links, examples, screenshots, or similar projects.
